name: Night Snail
description:
Night Snail is a game in which you are a snail that have to eat leaves and avoid the falling salt grains to survive in the dark of the night. You must eat the leaves before the time ends, after that you are going to get hungry and die.

The controls are simple:

  • WASD - To move

Thanks you, for playing the game !

Don't forget to give your feedback in the comments section.
